items.sentence: Let's wait and see what Tom has to say about it.
Tom isn't used to having to ask people for help.
Tom wasn't talking to you. He was talking to me.
I've been going steady with her for three years.
The last time that I saw Tom was three days ago.
That necklace was probably given to Mary by Tom.
Tom found a job as a high school French teacher.
Did you notice how Tom's right hand was shaking?
I told Tom I'd talk to Mary about what happened.
I told Tom I wouldn't do what he asked me to do.
I think you need to tell Tom to leave you alone.
Don't tell me you've never heard of Tom Jackson.
Don't tell me you really believed what Tom said.
Tom told me to make sure I didn't lose his keys.
You just sit there and wait until Tom gets back.
Tom has been a safety inspector for three years.
The teacher told Tom his essay was well written.
Tom just sat there and stared at Mary's picture.
Tom pulled a small flashlight out of his pocket.
Tom lived in a small town until he was thirteen.
Tom needs help putting a TV antenna on his roof.
With Tom's help, I'm sure I'll be able to do it.
Tom took out his cell phone and called for help.
I was able to do it with a little help from Tom.
I think the only person who can help you is Tom.
Tom wasn't the only one who was staring at Mary.
Tom isn't the only one who knows how to do that.
That tie looks just like the one Tom is wearing.
Do you have any idea where Tom might be waiting?
Tom came down the stairs carrying his suitcases.
There's a white picket fence around Tom's house.
Tom may be hard to reach for the next few hours.
Tom likes Mary, but he's too shy to talk to her.
Tom had no intention of waiting for three hours.
I take care of Tom when his parents are at work.
I was starting to think Tom would sleep all day.
You thought I was talking about Tom, didn't you?
Tom wants me to talk to Mary about her behavior.
Maybe I can talk Tom into going camping with us.
I think it's time we had a little talk with Tom.
Both Tom and Mary were talking at the same time.
Tom Jackson spoke to the teachers at our school.
Tom Jackson will be the new head of the company.
One of us has to stay here and take care of Tom.
Tom stayed home from school because he was sick.
Tom stayed up late to finish writing the report.
Tom wasn't sure they'd let him stay on the team.
Tom says he's never been sick a day in his life.
I guess I never realized how much I rely on Tom.
You shouldn't let Tom push you around like that.
